info.name: Caselaw
info.description:
A collection of POST requests in support of "How to get started with Knowledge Store in Azure Search".

The requests are incomplete. To complete them, provide valid URLs and access keys based on your Azure resources. 

For details: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/search/knowledge-store-howto

body.raw:
{
   "format":"solr",
   "synonyms": "
      USA, United States, United States of America\n
      Arkansas, AR\n
      Wal-Mart, Walmart\n
      Arkansas Freedom of Information Act, FOIA\n"
}
